content.raw: It's because of [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/440/detachable-joint-system/diff#Lsrc/systems/physics/Physics.ccT350) change. The `InitialModelSdf` component is now required by physics, but it wasn't being created in the test. The implication is that we can't create a model entity without an SDFormat representation of the model. I feel like this is somewhat of a major design decision though. Maybe we should discuss this at our meeting.
content.html: It's because of this change. The InitialModelSdf component is now required by physics, but it wasn't being created in the test. The implication is that we can't create a model entity without an SDFormat representation of the model. I feel like this is somewhat of a major design decision though. Maybe we should discuss this at our meeting.
